p: The components of ginger unipolar extracts were identified in the GC–MS study by comparing the obtained data with those available in the scientific literature, their retention indices, and their mass spectra that were in turn compared with a computer library’s data or with authentic compounds. In this work, more than 20 ginger terpenes have been identified (see Table S1 in the supplementary file). The following terpenes were found in the highest quantity: α-zingiberene, α-farnesen, β-sesquiphellandrene, neral, and zingiberone.
